attributes.comment:
I am a employee applying for the H1-B visa for the coming fiscal year. I oppose
the proposed increase in Immigration Application Fees. I am presently employed
by a small business. Small businesses in this country are very much in need of
high-skilled workers to expand their businesses and to stay competitive, two
very critical factors for small businesses. One of the factors that are a turn
off to small businesses while employing foreign workers is the complexity and
the financial investment involved with the entire process. From personal
experience, I am finding out that it takes a great deal of time in explantation
of the entire process and to obtain various information needed for the
application and to convince them to justify the cost for all of this. By
increasing the application fees, which is unjust as some of them are nearly
double the previous amount, I belive that many small businesses around the
nation are put in a disadvantageous position , when the need arises for them to
employ high skilled immigrants. I hope that the concerned parties reconsider
their position on this matter. Thank you.
attributes.title: Comment Submitted By Anonymous
